trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class represents a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> rappresenta un elemento di configurazione di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> possono essere configurati per applicazioni server usando i file di configurazione standard.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo costruttore viene utilizzato per inizializzare una nuova istanza del <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> (classe), il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> è impostata su <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>e il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> proprietà è impostata su `null`.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> istanza della classe deve essere impostata su valori appropriati per l'applicazione prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> method builds a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance based on the properties set on the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> compila una nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> in base alle proprietà impostate nella classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Nuova istanza di <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> che rappresenta i criteri di protezione estesa creati.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le proprietà di <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> istanza della classe deve essere impostata prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'elenco dei nomi dei provider di servizi (SPN, Service Provider Name) personalizzati in cui verificare la corrispondenza del nome SPN di un client per questo elemento dei criteri di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> che include l'elenco dei nomi SPN personalizzati in cui verificare la corrispondenza del nome SPN di un client.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore di applicazione dei criteri per questo elemento dei criteri di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore di <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> che indica quando applicare i criteri di protezione estesa.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo di protezione applicato dai criteri di protezione estesa per questo elemento dei criteri di configurazione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Valore di <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> che indica il tipo di protezione applicato dai criteri.
